page.title: 10Cuddlys Restaurant
page.content: {Cuddlys restaurant}used to be the {Blacksmiths shop}and then a{garage before it was converted into a {restaurant.}Cuddlys is owned by a man called{Graham Stubbs.}There is an {ice-cream parlour}and{Bistro.}Cuddlys is the only{restaurant}in Wentworth village.In side there is a fire place with brass ornaments hanging from the chimney breast. All the tables have been made out of pine in both sides of the{restaurant}and there are also matching chairs.In the{restaurant there are table mats with a picture of {Cuddly Bear}on and you can colour them in. The best pictures are all pinned up on the walls. On our visits to {Wentworth}we have stopped to have a drink of hot chocolate , coffee, tea or pop. Once we were going to have a Cuddlys Special ice-cream but the machine had run out.
